channel.title: Can someone give me the code of an NPC who talks above his head?
channel.description:
Can someone give me the code of an NPC who talks above his head?
I need a code, I know I'll place it in NpcHandler under "public void process() {"
Thanks to help ME.

item.title: Can someone give me the code of an NPC who talks above his head?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:2, topic:290250”]if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCidhere) { { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "text above head here"; }[/quote]

I enter this in NpcHandler under “public void process() {” and it doesn’t work. The Npc doesn’t talk above his head. What I do to fix ?

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone give me the code of an NPC who talks above his head?
